page.title: 15LIKES & DISLIKES - SURVEY
page.content:
What particular likes and dislikes do you or members of your household have about the area in which you live?
These comments were varied. 17 found nothing at all to dislike! 8 respondents liked aspects of the village life: the atmosphere; rural setting; peace and quiet and the village school. Others liked the proximity to the coast and large shops, the mild climate and the fact that the area suffers few of the effects of tourism. Dislikes noticeably included comments about the increase in traffic - too much for the road conditions in the area. There was concern about the cuts in government spending while the rates were still high. The planes from Goodwood were disliked as were the thunderbugs - prolific before harvest!
